Text:
Thank you! If you are concerned about upload speed and seeding, you should have uploaded these films separately. Many people already have some of them and will only select download for one or two, which will disturb future seeding.
Btw, your stated url to the other movie pack has been deleted. Should be http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4994037

I want to thank you again for "Heaven Help Us", which I have never found before on any torrent site. It was on my most-wanted list, because it was one of the first films for both Andrew McCarthy, Kevin Dillon, Mary Stuart Masterson and Patrick Dempsey.
